title: Major Verizon outage takes down phone calls, primarily on US West Coast
content:
Verizon customers are reporting that the network provider is undergoing a major outage. Though most of the outages seem to be occurring on the West Coast, users are reporting downed service across different parts of the United States.

moreâ€¦

The post Major Verizon outage takes down phone calls, primarily on US West Coast appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: As of around 3:05PM on the East coast, users have been reporting Verizon is down leaving users unable to make calls.
